QuestData.Title: Traversing the Rift
QuestData.Description: I've been mindful of your efforts, mortal. Do not feign surprise. Surely you've felt my eye upon you.$b$bThe time has come to peel back a layer of darkness from your mind. There are stark truths that you have grown ready to accept.$b$bBefore hearing the tale, you shall be shown firsthand what we face.$b$bPut your affairs in order, $c....
QuestData.LogDescription: Surristrasz wants you to travel to Coldarra. Once there, you are to speak with Archmage Berinand.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Coldarra, $c.$b$bUnder the Transitus Shield we lie hidden just a stone's throw from the Nexus, fortress of the great aspect Malygos and his blue dragonflight.$b$bDo make yourself comfortable.
